name: Dragon Dinner Date (First Course)
description:
Made for NaNoRenO 2022

A small sample of my upcoming game. Right now, it only features the first act, but more will be coming soon.

This is a solo-dev project. Everything was made by me with no remade assets. There's no music and no sfx, so don't go expecting a polished experience. I wanted to make this just so I could prove to myself I could actually make a visual novel. I've never used Ren'Py before, so if something doesn't work, please let me know.

The final version will be done (fingers crossed) before the end of the submission period, so please keep your eyes peeled!
